game_description: Puzzle Tropicana is a uniquely chilled-out collection of mental and physical puzzles. Featuring a wide variety of challenges to tax the brain of all ages and abilities. Not just one type of puzzle...test yourself with a crazy collection of brain teasers. Includes physics puzzles, jigsaws, musical challenges, picture puzzles, mathematical posers and many more. Set on a relaxing tropical beach to keep you calm as you concentrate on solving the puzzles.
